text: I'm wearing Smart Wool socks. I'm
wearing Timberland uh shoes and
Timberland pants. You You're going to
laugh because it was a New York day. So,
I'm wearing Oh, god. I'm wearing a Zena
blazer. I know this is a Bion shirt.
Don't laugh at me. Uh my wife got it for
me. And I'm wearing
uh oh, these are some Danish kind of
glasses. I don't know who they are. I
got a Red Sox hat here because we got to
carry we got to carry the colors. And
I'm wearing a watch that
um I don't know what brand it is. I
don't even have a brand. It's a cheap
old watch, but it was given to me by a
man whose son died when he was wearing
it. And so I don't know what brand it
is, but uh he asked me to wear it to
remember the sacrifice that others make
so that we can be free.
